Videos: Hybrid User Interface Publications: [Li18][Cho14a][Cho13][Wang12][Ulinski09, Ulinski07a, Ulinski07b] Multi-Scale Virtual Environment Interaction Techniques - this work researches interaction techniques for multi-scale virtual environments where travel requires adjusting 7 degrees-of-freedom, the 6 Euclidean ones plus scale. Publications: [Suma11][Suma10][Suma09] Multi-touch Interaction Techniques - this work research and develops interaction techniques on our custom multi-touch table. Videos: Hardware Overview Multi-touch Urban Growth Visualization Publications: [Butkiewicz09] [Butkiewicz08a] Visualization and Interactive Computer Graphics Geospatial Rendering and Visualization Algorithms - these works develop geometric algorithms for rendering and visualization of geo-spatial data.
